list_definition.definition: (of an area of a town etc) containing houses rather than offices, shops etc
requiring a person to live in the place where he works
of, concerned with, living in a place.

list_ex_of_english: Constructing familiarity and managing the self: ways of adapting to life in nursing and residential homes for older people.

In the process, the book raises several important issues about the formation and maintenance of residential space in one capitalist society.
